title: Text Page, "Cover Sheet for "Fuochi d'Artificio (Particolare)" [Sketch for "Fireworks," Detail], from "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio", ca. 1980
markings: Watermark horizontally across upper and lower edges of sheet:  Ingres-Fabriano
signed: Signed in pen and black ink, lower right:  Luce Balla; in pen and blue ink, lower right:  Elica Balla
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, above signatures, lower right:  45/150
description: Title page of second plate.  Vertical text block, flush right.  At upper right corner, title of plate 2, , at lower right; project authorization, with list of prints in portfolio. (See 1999-6-5-5.)

tombstone.epitaph:
Text Page, "Cover Sheet for "Fuochi d'Artificio (Particolare)" [Sketch for "Fireworks," Detail], from "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio", ca. 1980.
ca. 1980. Letterpress on cream laid paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-5-7.
